New Records: Mohammad Rizwan became the fastest player to score 3,000 T20I runs
Key Match Events: Shaheen Afridi picked three wickets, while Amir, Abrar and Shadab got two each
Mohammad Rizwan starred for the winning side by top-scoring with 45 runs
Ifran Khan Niazi steered the home side to victory with 18 runs
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan now lead the five-match series 1-0 after the first T20I was called off due to rain
Others: Pakistan's bowling attack was in top form as they bundled out the entire New Zealand side for 90 runs in 18.1 overs
